basics.name: Tiger Oakes
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software developer with 10 yrs experience. Built 2 mobile web browsers & hundreds of open source projects.

work.position: Firefox Android Developer Intern & Part-Time Student Worker
highlights: Built and shipped brand new web browser in **Kotlin** to **over 100,000,000 users on Google Play Store**.
Served as a **feature lead for Progressive Web App support**, providing a native feel to **thousands of web apps**.
Added Trusted Web Activity support to Firefox for Android, **featured in Chrome Dev Summit 2019 keynote**.
Wrote specifications for new Web App Manifest features as member of the **World Wide Web Consortium**.
Established testing infrastructure that improved code coverage by 150% and **doubled developer productivity**.
Built internal developer tool used by **entire Google Chrome for Android team** with **JavaScript** and **Python**.
Used **streams** and **background threads** to handle 180 MB downloads, rendering partial data in under 1 second.
Implemented keyboard navigation for tree structure to speed up productivity and add accessibility support.

work.summary: Vancouver startup simulating skin for VFX and prototyping clothing
highlights: Built **TypeScript Electron** client that interfaces with **C++** server to display 3D simulations with **WebGL**.
Migrated large program from **jQuery** to **React**, **Redux**, saving time and effort for future programmers.
Built new web search page feature in **Flow**, **React**, **Redux**, and **Python** displayed to **1,000,000 users monthly**.
Led hackathon team to build new product for in-restaurant experience which was picked up by sales team.

work.company: Centre for Sustainable Food Systems at UBC Farm
highlights: Developed custom **TypeScript** software and wrote fill algorithm to classify farm fields.
Designed and developed web portfolio, including GPU-accelerated parallax using **CSS** 3D transformations.

projects.name: Open Source
highlights: Built Maskable.app developer tool. Recommended by Google & CSS Tricks and is used **over 5,000 times/month**.
Implemented icon features for Google Bubblewrap & Microsoft PWABuilder, used **over 2,000 times/month**.
Added support for new commands with **Node.js** to appium-adb to interface with **Android** devices over USB.

projects.name: Speaking and Writing
highlights: Speaker at upcoming **CascadiaJS 2020** conference with **1,000 predicted online attendees**.
Wrote web development articles for **CSS Tricks**, **MDN**, and **Google web.dev** with thousands of views.
Authored guidebook on **MockK** testing library for **Kotlin** and **Android**, with **over 5,000 views/month**.

awards.title: Grand Prize: Congressional App Challenge 2014, Hawaiiâ€™s 2nd Congressional District
